metadata.title: CVE-2012-4401 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Moodle 2.2.x before 2.2.5 and 2.3.x before 2.3.2 allows remoteauthenticated users to bypass intended capability restrictions and performcertain topic changes by leveraging course-editing capabilities.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4401` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.6.dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.6.dfsg-1').
